text: You must be the detective. I've heard you take cases the police won't touch.

speaker: VIVIAN MARLOWE
text: My name is Vivian. My sister Eleanor was found dead this morning at the Avalon Hotel. Room 214.

speaker: VIVIAN
text: They're calling it suicide. Eleanor would never do that. She was afraid of something—someone.

speaker: VIVIAN
text: I need you to find who really killed her. I'll pay whatever it takes.

speaker: VIVIAN
text: Start at the Blue Moon bar. She spent her last evening there. Ask for a man called Mickey.

speaker: VIVIAN
text: And detective—be careful. Eleanor told me she was being followed.
